values: Omg well wasnt tht just the worst party ever! omg it was all good at first everyone jst gettin pissed havin fun. ANyway this gang on 15 asians with knives and balaclavers on turned up after some guy tht was at lukes party! Anyway they had fukin knives and bats and crow bars. They threw a brick at lukes kitchen window which is like where we all were so the lads were all like trying to get all us girls upstairs in the bedroom safe. ANyway some girls lyk tried to run outta the house and my mate nicole said summot to the asians who then pulled a knife on her and told her to get out of the way. Anyway they all ended up inside lukes house whislt this guy they were after was hid in a bedroom with the girls. Anyway some girls tht had got out called the police so nxt thing i know there are dog patrols and riot vans outside lukes house! ANyway they kinda literally chucked us all out, but then i dunno how but i got lost on a road by myself wearing only a fekkin vest top and skirt so i was FREEZING anyway this gang came bk and they were coming towards me so i  bezzed it sumwhere and found this lad who looked after me. SO abt half an hour later i went bk to lukes cos i hadnt seen him and i needed to check he was ok anyway i told the police i was hus gf and i was crying so they let me in lol anyway there was only me luke and this lad the asians were after so they gave statements and eventually the police went................... so yeah great what a party tht was!

God dint realise i ant updated of this long! mind u ive been snowed under all week with p.e coursework poor me LOL :P! Anyway yeah so i went out on sunday with dom to pizza hut and to the pics and it was jst fab!! Hes soooo sweet he wouldnt let me pay for anything i was like bloody hell! Yeah so tht was kewl!! Then on wednesday i went over to his house for the first time to go out for a meal with his rents which was....... different LOL! His dad was sooooo nice but his mum....... wot a bitch i was really upset she seemed really stuck up towards me and like i wasnt good enuf so tht was a bit upsettin but i suppose its dom im going out with not his mum so balls to her LOL!! Yeah anyway we had fun even without her sarcy remarks towards me lol! 
ANyway hes gone on holiday now for 10 tens and its only bin 1 day and im already at a lose end lol! His phone dunt work so i have NO contact its like ARGHHH. ANyway lukes avin a house party tomoz nite so im gon get pisssseddddddd and have fun and try 4get bt it lol! ooooo i got my valentines stuff from him too twas a MASSIVE teddy and some thorntons continentals LOL how original but naa bless him LOL! and the card was this little cute andrezx puppy i was like AWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW!
So yeah its all gd cnt wait till tomorro night go out n have fun, think im sleepin ova at lukes too cos i cant be arsed going home pissed avin my mum in my earhole LOL!

IM REALLY  HAPPY! and i know ur thinking yeh yeh katie u said this wen ur were with luke BUT NO this is different LMAO! Dom is sooooooooooo ace and u know wen u can jst tell sum1 really cares abt u i really can. I mean he comes to see me EVERY chance he has which luke neva did and its little things like luke never held my hand i had to grab his but nooo not with dom he neva lets go of me lol! And he was bin all cute today and said "my Katie" and i was like awwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww and im jst in such a gd mood cos im really really into him big time! Anyway hes tekkin me out on sundaaaaaay to the pics and for summot to eat somewhere so lukin forward to tth! Mind u dnt think i can eva eat agn afta tonite been to da sandros which is like poshest italian in huddersfield and i had garlic mushrooms starter mushroom pizza and lemon tart for dessert and it was bloody gorgeous but i actually thort i was going to be sick LOL!!!!
Twas my mums birthday lol!
Anyway yesh im in a mood now cos its msn friday and i proper rushed home to come on to not let the girls down and now no ones on so im like GRRRRRRRR LOL!!!!

Coll party pics hehehe!

College party was AMAZING! As always lol! SO yeah erm got a bit pissed before i even got there lol! Then ermmm danced the night away really! i was with Dom most of the night it was bloody ace lol! Oooooo and also like near the end of the night i went and sat on lukes knee and we had a reeeeeeeeeeeeet good chat even tho he was pretty pissed i'd sobered up by then but he was like im really really sorry katie and i luv u to bits and we shud stay good mates and i was like awwwhhhh yeah! So we had a lil friendly kiss for old times lol anyway tht sparked all this shit abt us been bk togethere and we're like NO and someone told dom but he understood us thank god lol! So yeah it was bloody ace! Mind u my feet fukin hurt and i dint get in till 3 so i coulnt keep my eyes open the next day at college LOL had to skive most of my lessons! SO yeah things are really good with me n dom actually! He seems really interested which is really nice! He keeps saying "My Katie" im like awhhhhhhhh LOL!!!!!
ANyway yeah we're off out this weekend for the 1st time really like proper out so tht shud be kewl!!!
I'll post pics later frm party if deano ever gets his ass into gear and sends em me!

MAD with a capital M i tell ya! Ok so here the deal i kinda have a new bf! Called Dom and i REALLY like him and ok ur thinkin wtf she only split up with luke like a week ago but gotta move on i suppose and i really like dom! I didnt know him b4 i jst saw him in the hall one day and told my mate nicole he looked cute and she ws like OH I KNOW DOM HES ACE! So of course cos shes nicole she told him! Anyway turns out he liked me too! So we went to town together the other week and really got on well. So yeah we got it together. Anyway brett who still really liked me is one of doms mates so he was less than impressed! ANyway he started spinning all this stuff abt dom obviusly trying to split up up cos he fukin wants me tht bad. Anyway he got all my fukin friends on his side and they all started ganging up agnst me and dom and were like wtf! ANyway in the end i told brett how much doing this was hurting me wen i was jst starting to feel happy agn and he kinda bked down so i think the waters are calm agn now! And its kinda brought me n dom closer in a way! So yeah monday will deffo be good now!

Rite ok im ok can so i can tlk abt it and its ok. Rite well yeah i split up with him because i hadnt said owt on here really because i dunno if i said it it wud make it seem more real i guess. Anyway for a couple of weeks things went downhill quite quick. He started ignoring me at college and stuff and we hung abt lots and he started making excuses not to see me and stuff and i dunno he just didnt at all seem interested. Anyway it was really gettin me down so i tried tlkin to him about it but lukes not much of a talker really and i kinda established that he had other stuff going on in his life and i dunno he was like well i havent got as much time as i used to. So anyway we carried on but in the end it was upsetting me too much and i wasnt happy always me making the effort with him so i decided to end it with him. ANyway yeah i was pretty cut up for a bit but im ok this week. We're still like mates and stuff so thats ok!
People have bin making me feel way better saying how a gud lukin girl like me cud do sooo much better than luke lol so its the college party on monday so i cant wait for tht now with my new single status! Already got a couple lined up LMAO omg how wrong does tht sound.......... oh well gotta play the field enjoy myself a bit b4 i get into another relationship LOL omg i sound like such a slut!
But anyway yeah im feelin better abt it all and everyone thinks we're gonna get bk together but no i dnt think we will do after all this.
So yeah cnt wait till monday now! hehehe got a kewl retro outfit! Black pleated skirt, legwarmers and a blk n white stripey jumper thing with plastic white hoop earrings and a big black thick headband lol looks pretty cool if i do say so myself! So yeah im on the pull i suppose LOL! Nah jst gonna dance and have fun with my girls and see wot happenes lol!
i guess me n luke broke up i cnt even fukin tlk abt it rite now cos omg i cnt believe it i jst wanan curl up and fukin die

ANyway jesus wot a night it was ace! and i was up and alive at 8 not a sign of a hangover im great apart from a bit of a bad taste in mi gob but nervmind that LMAO.

so yey good moood!

Wooooooooooooo well yey happy new year! hope everyones was as fun filled as mine which isnt really fun filled at all but hey new years is so-overrated i hate it anyway!

Then spent new years day looking after look and the day after tht looking after luke becos he was ill and home alone and he needed someone looking after him which i quite enjoyed actually i dunno why i just i dunno thts just my nature i love doing stuff for people and looking after people and caring cos it just makes me feel better :)
So yeah ollege is shit already and its the first day bk and im already behind with work which is always good! But on a good note NO MORE KEY SKILLLS!

Wooo byeee! XxxxxxxxxxxxxX

Beat luke at pool mind u he did let me win bless him!
ANyway cant believe im going to skipton for christmas week! It's jst wrong im gonna miss him so much! Gonna be doing homework the whole time probably!!! teachers are sooooo mean!
Anyway i'll stop rambling and go........ do summot lol
